name: Enforest
description:
Enforest is an "idle game" about growing your own forest over time. Your trees will generate seeds. Plant those seeds to get more trees and generate more seeds. Create a truly natural forest with trees scattered in seemingly random arrangements, or a perfectly organized orchard with neatly spaced rows. Every single tree is unique, and features a minimalist art style drawn entirely by code.

Enforest is meant to be played a little at a time. You could leave it running while you work or play another game, or you could just open it up for a few minutes every couple of days. Or you could play it for hours on end, never once looking away from the heart-pounding action of...trees....growing. That part is up to you.

Sometimes trees burst into flame. That's just nature. You might have to sacrifice your favorite conifer to save your prized maple. Or your could watch your entire forest disintegrate in a blazing inferno. Again, the choice is yours.

Thanks for playing!
